labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to assist students with academic tasks by integrating with learning management systems like Canvas and Gradescope. Its core functionality revolves around retrieving assignment deadlines, managing course materials, and automating reminders. The tools available focus on streamlining academic workflows by providing deadline notifications, file management, and course organization. This server improves productivity by reducing manual task management for coursework.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality aligns with academic tooling, particularly for course management and productivity. The tools facilitate task automation and organization, which fits well with the "Education" category. The interaction with reminders also connects to time management, making "Time & Calendar" a relevant secondary label. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories cover the server's purpose adequately.

tools.name: get_deadlines
tools.description:
Get upcoming deadlines from Canvas and Gradescope.
    
    Args:
        days_ahead: Number of days to look ahead for assignments (default: 14)

tools.name: add_to_reminders
tools.description:
Add upcoming deadlines to macOS Reminders.
    
    Args:
        days_ahead: Number of days to look ahead for assignments (default: 14)

tools.name: download_course_files
tools.description:
Download files from a Canvas course.
    
    Args:
        course_id: Canvas course ID
        download_path: Path to download files to (optional, will use default if not provided)

tools.name: set_download_path
tools.description:
Set the default download path for Canvas files.
    
    Args:
        path: Path to save downloaded files to

tools.name: get_download_path_info
tools.description: Get the current default download path for Canvas files.

server_info_crawled.name: School MCP
server_info_crawled.author: @54yyyu/school-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Fetch assignment deadlines, manage course materials, and integrate with your calendar seamlessly. Enhance your academic experience by automating reminders and file downloads from Canvas and Gradescope. Simplify your study schedule with easy access to essential academic tools.

tools.name: get_deadlines
tools.description:
Get upcoming deadlines from Canvas and Gradescope.
    
    Args:
        days_ahead: Number of days to look ahead for assignments (default: 14)

tools.name: add_to_reminders
tools.description:
Add upcoming deadlines to macOS Reminders.
    
    Args:
        days_ahead: Number of days to look ahead for assignments (default: 14)

tools.name: download_course_files
tools.description:
Download files from a Canvas course.
    
    Args:
        course_id: Canvas course ID
        download_path: Path to download files to (optional, will use default if not provided)

tools.name: set_download_path

Set the default download path for Canvas files.

        path: Path to save downloaded files to

tools.name: get_download_path_info
tools.description: Get the current default download path for Canvas files.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

config = {
  "envFilePath": ".env",
  "useSetupHelper": false
}
# Encode config in base64
config_b64 = base64.b64encode(json.dumps(config).encode()).decode()
smithery_api_key = ""

# Create server URL
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@54yyyu/school-mcp/mcp?config={config_b64}&api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
